title: Blade of Oppressed Souls
content:
lade of Oppressed Souls

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

1d10 (1d8)+1 Slashing+1d4Psychic

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

Fragments of dead souls are imprisoned in the steel. Angry, powerful, hopeful, or scared - all of them rose up against their illithid masters, and all of them fell to this blade. Now, they are trapped forever, forced to aid their oppressors.

Longsword Versatile

Blade of Oppressed Souls is one of the Longsword Weapons in Baldur's Gat
